title: 80/561/EEC: Commission Decision of 23 May 1980 on the implementation of the reform of agricultural structures in Italy pursuant to Council Directive 72/159/EEC (Only the Italian text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 23 May 1980  on the implementation of the reform of agricultural structures in Italy pursuant to Council Directive 72/159/EEC  (Only the Italian text is authentic)  (80/561/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The existing Italian provisions implementing Directive 72/159/EEC, as now applicable in the light of the provisions notified on 2 March 1980 specifying the comparable income for 1980 and indicating its rate of growth, continue to satisfy the conditions for financial contribution by the Community to common measures within the meaning of Article 15 of Directive 72/159/EEC.
This Decision is addressed to the Italian Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 23 May 1980.
For the Commission
Finn GUNDELACH
Vice-President  (1)OJ No L 96, 23.4.1972, p. 1. (2)OJ No L 145, 13.6.1977, p. 43.
